Title: Stand by Me
Overview: Gordie, Chris, Teddy and Vern are four friends who decide to hike to find the corpse of Ray Brower, a local teenager, who was hit by a train while plucking blueberries in the wild.
Tagline: For some, it's the last real taste of innocence, and the first real taste of life.
Keywords: based on novel, friendship, coming of age, railroad track, story within the story,  flipping coin, campfire story, reference to superman, normandy beach, child, 1950s, boys
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Act III Communications, The Body, Act III
Cast: Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman
